content:
Technical Lead and AI Engineer with expertise in designing reliable and scalable software architectures, applications, and platforms. Award-winning leader with specialized experience in AI Engineering and System Design.

Expertise in designing complex LLM-based applications including Agentic AI architecture using LangChain and LangGraph, Advanced RAG systems, and LLM-reasoning applications. Skilled in textual data analytics using LLMs, BERT, and embedding models.

Proven track record of leading technical teams to success and implementing innovative AI solutions that deliver measurable business impact.
